VisionSafe EVAS Training Solutions

VisionSafe offers comprehensive training solutions for the Emergency Vision Assurance System (EVAS), providing pilots and flight crews with the skills needed to operate effectively during smoke-in-cockpit emergencies. Our training options range from high-fidelity simulators to computer-based programs, ensuring every organization can find a solution that meets their operational needs and budget.

Training Benefits

  • Enhanced Safety: Crews trained with EVAS respond more effectively during smoke emergencies.
  • Confidence Building: Hands-on experience builds crew confidence in emergency equipment.
  • Muscle Memory Development: Practice creates automatic responses during high-stress situations. Critical to practice removing the inflatable vision unit and installing the unit on the glare shield so that it becomes a natural habit.
  • Realistic Scenarios: Smoke-filled training environments prepare crews for actual emergencies.

Training Options

Full Cockpit Trainer

Full Cockpit Trainer

Our premier training solution provides a realistic cockpit environment for high-fidelity, hands-on training.

  • Complete mock-ups with EVAS and smoke generation for realistic emergency simulation.
  • Allows operators to conduct training at their own facility.
  • Simulator includes two EVAS units to simplify training process and eliminate need to refold the Inflatable Vision Unit after each use.
  • On-site simulation and instructor training is included.
  • Ideal for flight schools, airlines, and large corporate flight departments.

Table Top System

Table Top System

A compact yet comprehensive training solution that simulates the pressure of an inflatable vision unit.

  • A flight deck and glare-shield mockup that can be placed on 2 X 4' table.
  • Simulator includes two EVAS units to simplify training process and eliminate need to refold the Inflatable Vision Unit after each use.
  • Portable design requires minimal space.

Training Units with Smoke Machine

Training Units with Smoke Machine

Designed for integration with existing flight simulators to enhance system familiarity.

  • Professional-grade smoke machine compatible with flight simulators.
  • Includes two EVAS units to simplify training process and eliminate need to refold the Inflatable Vision Unit after each use.
  • Integration guidance for existing simulator environments.
  • Ideal for organizations with existing simulator facilities.

On-Site Training

On-Site Training

Expert-led training at your facility with our mobile simulation unit.

  • Classroom instruction on EVAS operation and emergency procedures.
  • Hands-on practice with EVAS units.
  • Live smoke demonstration on our mobile simulation unit (conducted in parking lot).
  • Customizable curriculum based on aircraft type and operator needs.
  • Certification of completion for all participants.
  • Travel expenses may apply depending on location.

Computer-Based Training Program

Computer-Based Training Program

A digital learning solution providing foundational knowledge of EVAS operations.

  • Comprehensive EVAS deployment and usage tutorials.
  • Interactive simulations.
  • Knowledge assessment quizzes.
  • Unlimited user access within purchasing organization.
  • Regular content updates.
  • Accessible on multiple devices.
  • Ideal as a refresher or supplement to hands-on training.
Explore EVAS CBT

Training Partners

Simulator Training

Simulator training is available at more than 75 locations worldwide through Flight Safety International, CAE, and Airventure.

Computer-Based Training

EVAS CBT is available through King Schools.

Custom Training Solutions

VisionSafe can develop custom training programs to meet specific operational requirements. Contact our training team to discuss specialized needs for your organization.
